title: Have Pathological Self Confidence & Humility
content: The danger becomes that the huminity either overwhelms the ego and the drive, or that the self confidence and ego extinguish the humility.

title: You Owe The World Your Struggle, Not Your Sucess.
content: You are resposible for struggling, so struggle mightily. It is not the world's job to do your struggle for you. But, if you've tried your best; If you've struggled, and still failed, forgive yourself. Beacuase the world does not owe you its forgiveness. You owe it to yourself to forgive yourself.

title: Be A First Class Noticer
content: Become the type of person on whom nothing is lost, by changing the way you look at things. Because if you change the way you look at things, the things you look at change.

title: You Owe The World Your Struggle, Not Your Sucess.
content: You are resposible for struggling so struggle mightily.I
I feel bad for making you say theese things. It must mean you're in such a tough spot that you have no choice but to say them

...Every aberration has its reasons, they say. Araragi, you need to give some more though to why you encountered a vampire. Well that'd be... by chance, no? Im sure it was by chance. what ou need to think about is why that chance came about...
We are gods, but for the wisdom
How am I supposed to do that?
